title: Chicken and wild mushroom pie with carrots and peas
description: Cheat the pastry with shop-bought shortcrust if you don’t have time to make it yourself, while wild mushrooms up the ante in this chicken and mushroom pie.
ingredients: 350g/12oz wild mushrooms such as chanterelle, ceps, tompette, girolles
1 bunch baby carrots, washed and trimmed
